name: Acronym1R
summary: Acronym1_R is used for computing the volume bedload transport rate per unit width and bedload grain size distribution from a specified surface grain size distribution (with sand removed) (Db,i, Ff,i), i = 1..N+1, a specific gravity of the sediment (here equal to R + 1), a water discharge Q, a channel width B and a streamwise bed slope S.
author: Gary Parker
